languages.text: {n}Караэль подается вперед.{/n} "Два рейда успели скрыться в переплетениях Паутины и ждут избранного часа. В самой Комморре отряды кабала скрылись в недрах города. Мы выжидаем. Когда эти силы соберутся воедино, их хватит, чтобы захватить иной шпиль и поглотить и заставить служить себе несколько меньших кабалов..."

{n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль подается вперед.{/n} "Два рейда успели скрыться в переплетениях Паутины и ждут избранного часа. В самой Комморре отряды кабала скрылись в недрах города. Мы выжидаем. Когда эти силы соберутся воедино, их хватит, чтобы захватить иной шпиль и поглотить и заставить служить себе несколько меньших кабалов..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are waiting for the clandestine hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael lehnt sich nach vorne.{/n} "Zwei Angriffstrupps konnten sich im Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore verstecken und warten auf die gewählte Stunde. Auch tief unter Commorragh verstecken sich Truppen der Kabale. Wir warten ab. Wenn diese Truppen sich vereinen, reichen sie aus, um einen anderen Turm zu übernehmen und mehrere kleine Kabale zu absorbieren, die uns dienen werden ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael lehnt sich nach vorne.{/n} "Zwei Angriffstrupps konnten sich im Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore verstecken und warten auf die gewählte Stunde. Auch tief unter Commorragh verstecken sich Truppen der Kabale. Wir warten ab. Wenn diese Truppen sich vereinen, reichen sie aus, um einen anderen Turm zu übernehmen und mehrere kleine Kabale zu absorbieren, die uns dienen werden ..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔向前倾着身子。{/n}“两支突击小队已经藏在了错综复杂的网道之中，等待着合适的时机。除此之外，阴谋团的军队也躲藏在科摩罗内部。我们所有人都在等待时机，只要能将这些力量凝聚在一起，就足以攻下一座尖塔，吸收几支小型阴谋团为我们服务……”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔向前倾着身子。{/n}“两支突击小队已经藏在了错综复杂的网道之中，等待着合适的时机。除此之外，阴谋团的军队也躲藏在科摩罗内部。我们所有人都在等待时机，只要能将这些力量凝聚在一起，就足以攻下一座尖塔，吸收几支小型阴谋团为我们服务……”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se penche vers vous.{/n} « Deux groupes de raid ont réussi à se cacher dans l'enchevêtrement de la Toile et attendent le moment opportun. Des troupes de la Kabale se cachent dans les entrailles mêmes de Commorragh. Nous attendons notre heure. Quand ces forces se réuniront, elles suffiront à capturer une autre tour et à absorber plusieurs petites Kabales qui nous serviront... »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se penche vers vous.{/n} « Deux groupes de raid ont réussi à se cacher dans l'enchevêtrement de la Toile et attendent le moment opportun. Des troupes de la Kabale se cachent dans les entrailles mêmes de Commorragh. Nous attendons notre heure. Quand ces forces se réuniront, elles suffiront à capturer une autre tour et à absorber plusieurs petites Kabales qui nous serviront... »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael se inclina hacia delante.{/n} «Dos incursiones han logrado esconderse en la maraña de la Telaraña y esperan la hora elegida. Hay tropas de la Kábala escondidas en las entrañas de la propia Commorragh. Estamos esperando el momento. Cuando estas fuerzas se unan, bastarán para conquistar otra torre y absorber a varias Kábalas menores para que nos sirvan...».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael se inclina hacia delante.{/n} «Dos incursiones han logrado esconderse en la maraña de la Telaraña y esperan la hora elegida. Hay tropas de la Kábala escondidas en las entrañas de la propia Commorragh. Estamos esperando el momento. Cuando estas fuerzas se unan, bastarán para conquistar otra torre y absorber a varias Kábalas menores para que nos sirvan...».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}カラエルが身を乗り出す。{/n}「2組の仲間が網辻とのゴタゴタの末になんとか身を隠して来るべき時を待っている。コモラフの内部にも陰謀団の軍団が隠れている。我々は機会を待っている。これらの勢力が合わさりしだい、他の尖塔を奪い取れば、我々の仲間になるような小さな陰謀団をさらに吸収するのに十分な力になる…」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルが身を乗り出す。{/n}「2組の仲間が網辻とのゴタゴタの末になんとか身を隠して来るべき時を待っている。コモラフの内部にも陰謀団の軍団が隠れている。我々は機会を待っている。これらの勢力が合わさりしだい、他の尖塔を奪い取れば、我々の仲間になるような小さな陰謀団をさらに吸収するのに十分な力になる…」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael, ileri doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "İki baskın grubu, Ağyol'un düğümlerinde saklanmayı başardı. Doğru zamanı bekliyorlar. Commorragh'ın iç kısımlarında gizlenen Kabal birlikleri var. Fırsat kolluyoruz. Bu kuvvetler bir araya gelsin, kule ele geçirilebilecek ve bize hizmet edecek daha küçük Kabalları bünyemize katabileceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael leans forward.{/n} "Two raids managed to hide in the tangle of the Webway and are awaiting the chosen hour. There are Kabal troops hiding in the bowels of Commorragh itself. We are biding our time. When these forces come together, they will be enough to take over another spire and absorb several smaller Kabals who will serve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael ileri doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "İki baskın grubu Ağyol'un düğümlerinde gizlenmeyi başardı ve doğru zamanın gelmesini bekliyorlar. Commorragh'ın iç kısımlarında gizlenen Kabal birlikleri var. Doğru anı bekliyoruz. Bu kuvvetler bir araya geldiklerinde bir kule ele geçirilebilecek ve bazı daha küçük Kabalları hizmetine alabilecek seviyeye gelecek."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
